title: Ropa
description: A ROPA is a record of processing activity that shall be maintained by the data controller according to article 30 GDPR. A ROPA is a full picture of the data processing, including its purpose, extent and management.

name.description: The name of the processing activity

updatedAt.description: The date of the last update of the ProcessingRecord

jointDataControllers.description: Joint data controllers are a group of data controllers that jointly determine the purposes and means of processing of personal data

purposes.description: The purpose of the processing describes what the reason why the controller processes the personal data

recipients.description: The recipients are the internal and external entities that have access to the personal data in the context of the processing

internalDepartments.description: The list of InternalDepartments that process the personal data

externalOrganisations.description: The list of ExternalOrganisations that process the personal data

dataProcessors.description: The list of DataProcessors that process the personal data

securityMeasures.description: The list of the security measures adopted by the controller to ensure the confidentiality, integrity and availability of the processed personal data

dataTransfers.description: Mandatory informations about data transfers outside the EU or to international organisations according to Chapter V GDPR
